extractSimpleProjects.title: Extract simple projects
extractSimpleProjects.description: Check this field if you want to extract simplified project data. The results won't include details such as websites and phone contacts of coordinators and partners. Project pages won't need to be crawled and the whole run will be significantly faster thanks to that.

projectAction.title: Project Action
projectAction.description: Select project action you're interested in. If you skip this field, projects of all actions will be extracted.
enumTitles: KA2: Cooperation for innovation and the exchange of good practices

ongoingProjects.title: Ongoing projects
ongoingProjects.description: Check if you want to extract ongoing projects.

completedProjects.title: Completed projects
completedProjects.description: Check if you want to extract completed projects.

withResultsProjects.title: Projects with results
withResultsProjects.description: Check if you're only interested in projects with results.
